pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Spatial-Time Sequence Miner // Implementations of the algorithms present article Generalized Spatial-Time Sequence Miner, original title (Castro, Antonio; Borges, Heraldo ; Pacitti, Esther ; Porto, Fabio ; Coutinho, Rafaelli ; Ogasawara, Eduardo . Generalizao de Minerao de Sequncias Restritas no Espao e no Tempo. In: XXXVI SBBD - Simpsio Brasileiro de Banco de Dados, 2021 doi:10.5753/sbbd.2021.17891).
